name: Don'tforgetmewhenI'mgone
0: ”Alexa don't forget me when I'm gone”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: don't forget me when i'm gone
des:
Now Alexa can assist you to share your life story with succeeding generations through the use of the "Alexa, Don't Forget Me When I'm Gone 28 Day Challenge."

Leave an inspirational and deliberate video memoir for your family, community, friends, and the people you love. 

Tell future generations about how you lived your life story. 

Express your experiences, accomplishments, and struggles with them through the "Alexa, Don’t Forget Me When I'm Gone 28 Day Challenge."

How it works?

In this Challenge, everyday for 28 days, Alexa will ask you a question about your life, and you record your story on video. 

Then when you post the videos on social media, it will form them into an amazing video memoir.

Everyone’s life is unique in so many ways. 

We all have stories behind our decisions, struggles, preceding triumphs, and lessons learned.

These stories and experiences are worth sharing and remembering.

If you have an elder parent or grandparent, this is the most meaningful challenge to make them feel recognized and loved and that their life meant something.

This is the #alexadontforgetmewhenimgone28daychallenge.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
